title: The Bedding Crasher
description: When is it appropriate to ask to crash at a friend's place? Should the practice be curtailed when one reaches a certain age or level of financial security? Chris and Emily bring this case against their friend Pat.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
